title: Drawing, "Constance Towers as Marie Duplessis in Dumas et Fils", ca. 1967
medium: Opaque watercolor, graphite, point of brush and black ink on gray illustration board
signed: Signed in point of brush and light red watercolor at lower center: Freddy / Wittop
inscribed: Inscribed at upper right: Dumas et Fils; inscribed in point of brush and dark red watercolor at upper right: Marie Duplessis. / (Constance Towers). Verso: inscribed in pen and black ink at upper center: L.A. Light Opera Comp
description: Woman in long peach-colored dress, green sash with white rose at waist, arm outstretched. Constance Towers as Marie Duplessis in Dumas et Fils

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Constance Towers as Marie Duplessis in Dumas et Fils", ca. 1967.
ca. 1967. Opaque watercolor, graphite, point of brush and black ink on gray illustration board. Gift of Freddy Wittop. 1971-1-13.
